comments:
From bug 84512:

I started with a new workspace, using 3.1M6.  I imported the plugins I wanted 
to
debug and generated a new Eclipse Application launch configuration with all
defaults.  When I launch this configuration, I get
java.io.FileNotFoundException:
/home/tools/eclipse/3.1M6/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0.jar/eclipse.pr
operties
(Not a directory).

Is there a workaround for this?  I can't launch Eclipse applications as is
because of this.

I can't reproduce nor track down where this FileNotFound exception is being 
thrown.

In the meantime, try importing the org.eclipse.osgi plugin into your workspace 
using the plugin import wizard.

I had originally commented on bug 84512 which had an identical call stack in its
comments.  I'm adding it to this bug for convenience.  Also, I've noticed that
the line numbers are different, though the call chain is the same (I assume the
other bug was reported against an earlier version).

!SESSION Fri Apr 29 08:39:49 PDT 2005 ------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Apr 29, 2005 08:39:49.486
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.io.FileNotFoundException:
/home/tools/eclipse/3.1M6/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0.jar/eclipse.properties
(Not a directory)
	at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
	at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106)
	at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:66)
	at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(FileURLConnection.java:70)
	at
sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(FileURLConnection.java:161)
	at java.net.URL.openStream(URL.java:1007)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.load(Main.java:1068)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.loadProperties(Main.java:1040)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.addBaseJars(Main.java:294)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getDevPath(Main.java:284)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getBootPath(Main.java:366)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:644)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:628)

didn't see that.  sorry.  then this is not a pde issue and it is a dup of bug 
84512

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 84512 ***
